title: Court comes down heavily on Bailiff who sealed Oyo's office, says action is illegal
description: Oyo's Ahmedabad office was sealed due to a warrant favoring a hotelier over unpaid dues but was reopened following a court ruling that deemed the distress warrant invalid. Oyo reported a net profit of Rs 229 crore for FY 2024, with significant growth in its hotel and vacation home portfolio.
